text: A leadership election was held by the People's Justice Party (KeADILan) on 10 November 2001. It was won by incumbent President of KeADILan, Wan Azizah Wan Ismail. ==Central Executive Committee election results== Source ===Permanent Chairman=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! Candidate !! Delegates' votes |- | align=left| Abdul Rahman Abdul Kader || won uncontested |- | colspan=3 bgcolor=dcdcdc| |} ===Deputy Permanent Chairman=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! Candidate !! Delegates' votes |- | align=left| Mahyuddin Shaari || won uncontested |- | colspan=3 bgcolor=dcdcdc| |} ===President=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! Candidate !! Delegates' votes |- | align=left| Wan Azizah Wan Ismail || won uncontested |- | colspan=3 bgcolor=dcdcdc| |} ===Deputy President=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! Candidate !! Delegates' votes |- | align=left| Abdul Rahman Othman || 521 votes |- | colspan=3 bgcolor=dcdcdc| |- | align=left| Muhammad Nur Manuty || 477 votes |} ===Vice Presidents=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- !
